mapper.sql: notice_no AS noticeNo, notice_title AS noticeTitle, notice_content AS noticeContent, notice_date AS noticeDate, notice_type AS noticeType, notice_target AS noticeTarget
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO notice ( notice_title, notice_content, notice_type, notice_target ) VALUES ( #{noticeTitle}, #{noticeContent}, #{noticeType}, #{noticeTarget} )
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
mapper.select:
SELECT FROM (SELECT @ROWNUM := @ROWNUM + 1 AS ROWNUM, LISTA.notice_no, LISTA.notice_title, LISTA.notice_content, LISTA.notice_date, LISTA.notice_type, LISTA.notice_target FROM (SELECT @ROWNUM := 0) R, (SELECT notice_no, notice_title, notice_content, notice_date, notice_type, notice_target FROM notice ORDER BY notice_date DESC) LISTA )LISTB
WHERE LISTB.ROWNUM <= (#{page} * 8) AND LISTB.ROWNUM >= ( (#{page}-1) * 8) + 1 ;
